name: friend-ball
effect: Used by a trainer in battle : Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon. If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost. If caught, the wild Pokémon’s happiness starts at 200.
short_effect: Caught Pokémon start with 200 happiness. Made from Grn Apricorn.

flavor_text.x_y: A strange Poké Ball that will make the wild Pokémon caught with it more friendly toward you immediately.
